message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. This is a great deal considering its value to me.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product to you, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500 for the product.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While I value the product at $12,000, I'm willing to come down a bit further.  I'd accept $9,750.  This is a fair compromise, and it allows us both to get a good deal.
Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking to keep the cost below $10,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,600 for the product.
